About Me

Let me tell you lettel about myself and what I do...

Your Project Is In Safe Hands

A highly creative developer in a variety of exciting projects. A level head and rational approach to problem solving combined with a passion for innovative and fresh ideas has led to a portfolio of impressive solutions. Technically competent and industry aware means that each project is undertaken with the most up-to-date and relevant foundations available. A strong communicator with the ability to convey ideas clearly with an emphasis on client satisfaction.


CORE SKILLS
Mobile UI design expertise Cross-platform mobile app development using Xamarin and similar Programming languages including: HTML 5, C#, VB.Net Swift, Java, CSS, Jquery, AJAX, PHP, Laravel, Flutter Confident with iOS and Android APIs Strong communicator, able to motivate and engage teams in multiple remote locations
